nodes.text: A contact met with Resistance operative Poe Dameron on the Wayward Comet refueling station during the Resistance's war with the First Order to provide Dameron with the location of a cache of impounded weapons in an abandoned New Republic base on the moon of Avedot. Trusting the contact's information, Dameron traveled to the moon with fellow Resistance member Finn to retrieve the weapons.

The contact was first mentioned in the comic Allegiance 1, written by Ethan Sacks and published by Marvel Comics on October 9, 2019. While Allegiance 1 refers to the contact as male, the following issue contradicts this, referring to the contact as female.
